item.title: 零售商 Conn's 在销售额下滑的情况下考虑申请破产
item.description: 据知情人士透露，家具零售商 Conn's Inc. 正准备申请破产，因为该公司面临销售下滑，并在努力整合竞争对手的连锁店。【原文：Furniture retailer Conn’s Inc. is preparing for a potential bankruptcy filing as it faces sales declines and struggles to integrate a rival chain, according to people with knowledge of the plans.】

item.title: 得克萨斯州州长希望将天然气工厂基金增加一倍，达到 100 亿美元
item.description: 得克萨斯州州长格雷格-阿博特（Greg Abbott）希望将新设立的天然气发电厂建设贷款计划增加一倍，达到 100 亿美元，以满足该州日益增长的电力需求。【原文：Texas Governor Greg Abbott wants to double a newly created loan program for building gas-fired power plants to $10 billion in order to meet the state’s growing demand for electricity.】

item.title: 北方数据考虑让人工智能部门赴美上市，估值最高可达 160 亿美元
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，北方数据公司（Northern Data AG）正在与潜在的顾问商谈在美国首次公开发行其人工智能云计算和数据中心合并业务的事宜，估值可能高达 160 亿美元。【原文：Northern Data AG is speaking with potential advisers about a US initial public offering of its combined artificial intelligence cloud computing and data center businesses that could fetch a valuation of as much as $16 billion, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 拉加德称欧洲央行需要时间权衡通胀不确定性
item.description: 欧洲央行行长克里斯蒂娜-拉加德（Christine Lagarde）表示，欧洲央行还没有足够的证据表明通胀威胁已经过去；这也助长了人们对欧洲央行官员本月将暂缓降息的预期。【原文：The European Central Bank doesn’t yet have sufficient evidence that inflation threats have passed, President Christine Lagarde said — feeding expectations that officials will take a break from cutting interest rates this month.】

item.title: 英国精品店 Robey Warshaw 罕见地从摩根大通聘请合伙人
item.description: Robey Warshaw LLP 是一家小型咨询公司，以参与英国一些最大的并购案而闻名，该公司罕见地聘用了一名合伙人。【原文：Robey Warshaw LLP, the tiny advisory firm known for its work on some of the UK’s biggest mergers and acquisitions, has made a rare hire at the partner level.】

item.title: 前亿万富翁因欺诈投资者高盛和谷歌被判 7 年半监禁
item.description: 芝加哥一名前亿万富翁因在一家广告初创公司欺诈 10 亿美元而被判处七年半监禁，该公司的投资者包括高盛集团、谷歌母公司 Alphabet 公司和伊利诺伊州州长 JB Pritzker 的风险投资公司。【原文：A former jet-setting Chicago billionaire was sentenced to seven and a half years in prison for a $1 billion fraud at an advertising startup that included investors such as Goldman Sachs Group Inc., Google parent Alphabet Inc. and Illinois Governor JB Pritzker’s venture capital firm.】

item.title: 莫桑比克偿还 2.2 亿美元债务以结束 "金枪鱼债券 "风波
item.description: 莫桑比克同意向包括 VTB Capital Plc 和 Banco Comercial Português S.A. 在内的债权人支付 2.2 亿美元，该和解协议是莫桑比克长达十年之久的金枪鱼债券丑闻的一部分，该丑闻以违约告终。【原文：Mozambique agreed to pay creditors including VTB Capital Plc and Banco Comercial Português S.A. $220 million in a settlement that formed part of the nation’s decade-old tuna bond scandal that ended in default.】

item.title: 最高法院的裁决预示美元仍有上涨空间，美元因此获得额外提振
item.description: 美元在最高法院作出重要裁决后走高，凸显出如果唐纳德-特朗普再次担任总统，美元有可能进一步走高。【原文：The dollar’s advance following a crucial Supreme Court ruling highlights the potential for further gains in the US currency in case of a second Donald Trump presidency.】

item.title: 欧洲央行的 Wunsch 需要说服 2024 年进行两次以上的削减
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员皮埃尔-旺施（Pierre Wunsch）需要彻底确信通胀率将重返 2% 的目标，他才会支持今年降息两次以上。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Pierre Wunsch would need to be thoroughly convinced that inflation was headed back to the 2% target in order for him to back more than two reductions in interest rates this year.】

item.title: 在大选前的热潮中，市政债券销售额飙升至创纪录的 2360 亿美元
item.description: 在各州市抓住利率更加稳定的机会涌入市场后，借贷激增推动市政交易量创下了有史以来最快的开年记录。【原文：A surge in borrowing pushed municipal deal flow to the fastest start to the year on record after states and cities seized on more stable interest rates to flood the market.】

item.title: 芝加哥养老金债务升至 370 亿美元，市政府急需现金
item.description: 由于新的法律和会计措施增加了成本，芝加哥的养老金负担去年再次攀升，首任市长布兰登-约翰逊（Brandon Johnson）也在寻求新的收入。【原文：Chicago’s pension burden climbed again last year as new laws and accounting measures added to costs, and first-term Mayor Brandon Johnson looks for new revenue.】

item.title: 夏季高等级公司债券销售将持续火爆
item.description: 负责承销美国蓝筹公司债券的华尔街专业人士正准备迎接一个繁忙的夏天，而不是像往常一样在 7 月和 8 月放缓脚步。【原文：The Wall Street professionals that underwrite blue-chip US corporate bond sales are bracing for a busy summer, instead of the usual slowdown in July and August.】

item.title: 阿根廷官员努力加强银行对债务计划的支持
item.description: 据直接知情人士透露，阿根廷政府高级官员告诉银行家们，如有必要，他们将购买新的国库券，以保证市场的流动性，这是第二阶段经济改革的关键部分。【原文：Senior government officials in Argentina told bankers that they’ll buy up new Treasury notes if necessary to guarantee liquidity in the market as a key part of the second phase of their economic overhaul, according to people with direct knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 假日烘焙旺季来临，黄油供应紧张，跃升至创纪录水平
item.description: 由于全球供应量有限，黄油价格从未如此昂贵，这让买家们在今年晚些时候的节日烘焙旺季前趋之若鹜。【原文：Butter has never been this expensive as a limited world supply has buyers scrambling before the holiday baking season later this year.】

item.title: 刚果 Gecamines 反对 Trafigura 支持的钴矿商交易
item.description: 刚果民主共和国国有矿商 Gecamines 表示将反对将 Trafigura 集团支持的矿商 Chemaf Resources Ltd. 出售给中国的 Norin Mining Ltd.。【原文：Democratic Republic of Congo’s state-owned miner Gecamines said it will oppose the sale of Trafigura Group-backed miner Chemaf Resources Ltd. to China’s Norin Mining Ltd.】

item.title: 戴维斯解释为什么现在到处都有问责水槽
item.description:
世界是如何失去理智的？【原文：

And how the world lost its mind.

】

item.title: Farmpalooza "旨在重振巴西农业资助的魅力
item.description: 过去三年，巴西最热门的投资项目之一是新兴的农业融资行业。现在不再是了。【原文：For the past three years, one of the hottest investment plays in Brazil has been the emerging industry for agriculture financing. No longer.】

item.title: 税收法案削减 6 亿美元后 SVB 金融债券上涨
item.description: 硅谷银行金融集团（SVB Financial Group）的潜在税费获得了超过 6 亿美元的减免，从而提高了与破产的硅谷银行前母公司相关的一些债券的价值，并消除了其在破产保护中偿还债权人的障碍。【原文：SVB Financial Group secured a more than $600 million cut to its potential tax bill, boosting some bonds tied to the bankrupt former parent of Silicon Valley Bank and removing an obstacle in its path to repaying creditors in Chapter 11.】

item.title: ViaPath 在收到 FCC 提案后搁置再融资交易
item.description: 据知情人士透露，在美国联邦通信委员会（Federal Communications Commission）提出降低在押人员电话和视频通话费率的规定后，监狱电信供应商 ViaPath Technologies 已搁置了一项几近完成的债务交易。【原文：Prison telecom provider ViaPath Technologies has placed a nearly-finished debt deal on hold after the Federal Communications Commission proposed rules to reduce phone and video call rates for incarcerated individuals, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 加密货币投资产品连续第三周出现资金外流
item.description: 数字资产投资产品连续第三周出现资金外流，不过撤资速度有所放缓，这可能是投资者情绪发生了转变。【原文：Digital asset investment products saw outflows for a third consecutive week, though withdraws slowed in what may be a possible shift in investor sentiment.】

item.title: 西姆库斯称，除非出现意外，欧洲央行今年可能再减息两次
item.description: 欧洲央行理事会成员格迪米纳斯-西姆库斯（Gediminas Simkus）表示，如果经济如官员们预测的那样发展，欧洲央行将在 2024 年再降低两次借贷成本的假设可能会被证明是正确的。【原文：Assumptions that the European Central Bank will lower borrowing costs twice more in 2024 may prove correct if the economy develops as officials predict, according to Governing Council member Gediminas Simkus.】

item.title: 欧佩克原油产量保持稳定，部分成员国产量超标
item.description: 欧佩克（OPEC）原油产量连续第三个月保持稳定，而一些主要成员国的原油产量继续超过商定的限额。【原文：OPEC’s crude production remained steady for a third month, while some key members continued to pump above agreed limits.】

item.title: 世界银行启动将担保额提高至 200 亿美元的计划
item.description: 世界银行推出了一项新计划，旨在到本十年末将担保额提高两倍，达到 200 亿美元，同时努力调动数万亿美元的投资，为贫穷国家的发展和气候项目提供资金。【原文：The World Bank launched a new program that aims to triple guarantees to $20 billion by the end of the decade, as it seeks to mobilize trillions of dollars in investments to finance development and climate projects in poor countries.】

item.title: 马士基退出后，DSV、CVC 被视为全球国际货运的主要竞争者
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，在 AP Moller-Maersk A/S 退出竞购后，丹麦运输集团 DSV A/S 和 CVC Capital Partners Plc 被视为德国铁路公司物流部门 DB Schenker 的主要竞争者。【原文：Danish transport group DSV A/S and CVC Capital Partners Plc are seen as the leading contenders for Deutsche Bahn AG’s logistics unit DB Schenker after AP Moller-Maersk A/S dropped out of the running, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 雷诺承诺采用更便宜的工艺将电动汽车电池成本降低 20
item.description: 雷诺汽车公司（Renault SA）承诺将电池成本降低约 20%，达成协议在其电动汽车和软件平台中使用更便宜的电池化学材料和新的生产工艺，以保持竞争力。【原文：Renault SA pledged to reduce its battery costs by around 20%, forging a deal to use cheaper cell chemistry and a new production process in its electric-vehicle and software platform to remain competitive.】

item.title: 债务协议达成后，加纳力争本月启动欧洲债券交易
item.description: 加纳财政部长穆罕默德-阿明-亚当（Mohammed Amin Adam）表示，在与私人债权人就重整 130 亿美元债务达成原则性协议后，加纳预计将于本月启动欧元债券交换计划。【原文：Ghana expects to start a eurobond exchange program this month, after reaching an agreement in principle with private creditors to revamp $13 billion of debt, Finance Minister Mohammed Amin Adam said.】

item.title: 法国的未来越来越窄：投资者面临的两种不利局面
item.description: 法国第一轮临时立法选举已将可能的结果缩小到两种，这两种结果都预示着投资者将面临长期的不确定性。【原文：The first round of France’s snap legislative elections has narrowed the possible outcomes to two — both of which presage prolonged uncertainty for investors.】

item.title: 据说 EQT 接近达成 30 亿欧元灰狗所有者股权交易
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，EQT AB 公司即将达成收购 Flix SE 少数股权的交易，该交易对这家德国公交和火车运营商的估值约为 30 亿欧元（32 亿美元），为近期私募股权交易的复苏添上了浓墨重彩的一笔。【原文：EQT AB is nearing a deal to buy a minority stake in Flix SE in a transaction valuing the German bus and train operator at about €3 billion ($3.2 billion), people familiar with the matter said, adding to the recent revival in private equity dealmaking.】

item.title: 美联储官员将 "情景 "作为新的沟通方式
item.description: 中央银行有一个新的流行词：情景。【原文：There’s a new buzzword in central banking: scenarios.】

item.title: 随着指数权重上升，印度将有更多债券买家转向在岸市场
item.description: 海外投资者告诉美国银行，一旦印度在摩根大通新兴市场指数中的权重到10月份上升到5%，将有更多的全球基金在印度注册并直接购买该国的债券。【原文：More global funds will register in India and directly buy the nation’s bonds once its weight in the JPMorgan Chase & Co. emerging market index rises to as much as 5% by October, overseas investors told the US bank.】
